Text: November 1, 2016 UN Chief urges South Africa to reconsider quitting ICC   The United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon regretted the South Africa’s decision to leave the International Criminal Court (ICC) and expressed hope that it would reconsider the decision before the withdrawal takes effect.
